krazconfig.visual.inventory.hideRecipeBo: Hides the recipe book from the inventory.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.hideSlotHigh: Hide Slot Highlighting When Tooltip Empty
Hides the slot hightlighting of items with empty tooltips.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.cancelClicks: Cancel Clicks On Slot When Tooltip Empty
Cancels the clicks on items with empty tooltips.
